programme.desc: Angel Eyes: Directed by Luis Mandoki. With Jennifer Lopez, Jim Caviezel, Jeremy Sisto, Terrence Howard. A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0225071/","name":"Angel Eyes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQwNzI2OTY2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTI3ODc5._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0225071/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"caspian1978"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great movie that was promoted badly","reviewBody":"Do you remember the previews for Angel Eyes? Many of us don't. What few of us remember is a 30 second preview that ran only a handful of times that showed Jennifer Lopez as a female cop. That was it. Na drama, no emotion, the previews told the audience a story about a female police officer, nothing else. This is probably the biggest reason why nobody went to see this movie when it went to the cinema. Only when it hit the video stores, did people start wo watch. A beautiful film, Angel Eyes is a romance. Dealing with redemption, it deals with many degrees of love and hope. In fact, many people detail Jennifer Lopez as "Angel Eyes." This is not true. Take a deeper look and you will see that James Caviezel is the true Angel Eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23495,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-17","keywords":"female police officer,kissing,wet hair,sex in sitting position,lotus position","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angel Eyes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3350593817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q5ODM1OTAtNDdiZi00MTE1LWI3NjUtODE5ZWM0YjgyNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q5ODM1OTAtNDdiZi00MTE1LWI3NjUtODE5ZWM0YjgyNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000182/","name":"Jennifer Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001029/","name":"Jim Caviezel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001502/","name":"Luis Mandoki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224187/","name":"Gerald Di Pego"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

96 Minutes
programme.desc: 96 Minutes: Directed by Aimee Lagos. With Christian Serratos, Brittany Snow, David Oyelowo, Evan Ross. The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1641385/","name":"96 Minutes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjQ2ODM5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM3NDk1Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1641385/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cosmo_tiger"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":""Crash" with teens. I liked it much more then I expected to. Pretty emotional and powerful. A good watch. I say B+","reviewBody":""I never should have gotten out of bed this morning." Carley (Snow) is about to graduate from college and her father isn't interested in attending. Lena (Serratos) just found out that her boyfriend is cheating on her. Dre (Ross) just found out that he will be able to graduate high school and finally has found a way out of gang life. Kevin (Trautmann) wants nothing more then to join a gang. When him and Dre get into an argument that ends up in carjacking the car that belongs to Carley with Lena has a passenger. The best way to describe this is "Crash" with teens. Total strangers who are all connected by one event that threatens to ruin all of them. This is very moving, powerful and intense. I highly recommend this one but much like "Crash" it's not really one you can watch over and over. The acting is great and the movie is a mix of flashbacks and current events that really make you feel connected to the characters and find your self sad and angry all at once. Overall, a surprisingly good movie that deserves to be watched. I give it a B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-14","keywords":"child with a gun,shooting a woman,woman in jeopardy,carjacking,atlanta georgia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"96 Minutes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1981719321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for 96 Minutes"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811242/","name":"Brittany Snow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1963091/","name":"Evan Ross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2759438/","name":"Sharon Conley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0276411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0321415/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Edge of Winter
U progu zimy
Edge of Winter
programme.desc:
Edge of Winter: Directed by Rob Connolly. With Joel Kinnaman, Percy Hynes White, Tom Holland, Rachelle Lefevre. When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4526546/","name":"Edge of Winter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzOTg5NDE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM5MTA1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4526546/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vegicat"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Acting, Decent Movie","reviewBody":"No idea why people are harshing on this movie. Yes, the plot is simple, but that's because it's not a horror flick or action flick - - it's a psychological family drama thriller. As in, tense.

There's beautiful scenery, minimal music, and other than a few scenes (not going to spoil that), most of what happens is fairly straightforward. Joel Kinnaman, looking a bit haggard, (the delicious co-star of The Killing) delivers top-notch acting, as do both of the boys. Their relationship and interaction is believable, and thankfully, there isn't any annoying precociousness or preciousness in the kid's characters. 

I'm not sure what people were expecting from the movie, but after reading some of the reviews/comments, I watched it anyway, and I wasn't disappointed. If you're looking for something with a lot of violence or gore, or some feel-good story with a dramatic ending, this isn't the film for you. If you are looking for a somewhat bleak story line with great acting, then check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3966,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"brother brother relationship,father son relationship,teenage boy,winter,snow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060498713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recently divorced and laid off from his job, Elliot Baker (Joel Kinnaman, Suicide Squad; Run All Night) is desperate to spend more time bonding with his sons, Bradley (Tom Holland, Captain America: Civil War) and Caleb (Percy Hynes White, Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb). What starts as family day trip to teach his boys how to shoot turns into a nightmare when they become stranded. As they retreat to a desolate cabin, Elliot's mounting fear of losing custody pushes him to the edge. The brothers quickly realize that the man responsible for keeping them safe has now become their biggest threat."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172478/","name":"Joel Kinnaman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4007171/","name":"Percy Hynes White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232635/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593227/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1954504/","name":"Kyle Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Historia Kuby Rozpruwacza
programme.desc: Twórcy dokumentu badają fenomen słynnego zabójcy prostytutek, działającego u schyłku XIX wieku tajemniczego Kuby Rozpruwacza. Często uznawany jest on, niekoniecznie słusznie, za pierwszego w historii seryjnego mordercę. Do dziś nie odkryto jego tożsamości. Siejący postrach na ulicach Londynu w okolicach Whitechapel Kuba Rozpruwacz inspirował i inspiruje do dziś wielu twórców. Powstało wiele powieści, których jest bohaterem, rozprawy naukowe, filmy, musicale, gry planszowe itd.

programme.title: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz
Outpost: Front wschodni
Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz
programme.desc: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz: Directed by Kieran Parker. With Bryan Larkin, Iván Kamarás, Velibor Topic, Laurentiu Possa. In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruthless and notorious of all military special forces: the Russian Spetsnaz." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241403/","name":"Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NzAwODEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMwNTQ2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruth","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241403/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hobgoblinlol"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable","reviewBody":"Honestly, don't know why it got 4.2 in my opinion the movie at least deserves 5.0-6.0 yes it is a cheesy sci-fi plot, but I think it is well executed. The thing I love about Outpost movies is the atmosphere and even though I think that the film took an odd turn by going back to WW2 to have an origin story it was still well done. But we can all see that the budget of the movie isn't completely as good as the first Outpost. The acting is decent and the action is good. Plot and the story maybe little bit too cheesy, but it's a Nazi zombie sci-fi flick so what do you expect? god father? I'm actually surprised with the stern treatment Outpost movies receive. Not to mention when people call ''Dead Snow'' good it's just eerie. Even Frankenstein's army has 5.0 than this considering the fact that it is not as good. War of the dead has 4.0 even though it's not an awful disaster. This one actually had some cameos and references from the previous films including the Beethoven song that starts randomly playing once in a while in all three films (very good touch in my opinion) as far as I am concerned the movie is definitely a 5.0 - 6.0/10. It wouldn't hurt to let the logic fly out and enjoy a cheesy flick that can grant you certain entertainment.\n\nIMDb and Rotten Tomatoes logic: if it's not a masterpiece, it's bad. Even though IMDb is a saint compared to Rotten Tomatoes. Hopefully, when more people vote it'll at least get the rating of 5.0","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2276,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-06-27","keywords":"zombie,underground facility,escape,prisoner,ss officer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385922/","name":"Bryan Larkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436442/","name":"Iván Kamarás"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867677/","name":"Velibor Topic"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662404/","name":"Kieran Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197375/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0428412/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2361978/","name":"Rae Brunton"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruthless and notorious of all military special forces: the Russian Spetsnaz." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241403/","name":"Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NzAwODEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMwNTQ2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruth","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241403/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hobgoblinlol","dateCreated":"2013-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable","reviewBody":"Honestly, don't know why it got 4.2 in my opinion the movie at least deserves 5.0-6.0 yes it is a cheesy sci-fi plot, but I think it is well executed. The thing I love about Outpost movies is the atmosphere and even though I think that the film took an odd turn by going back to WW2 to have an origin story it was still well done. But we can all see that the budget of the movie isn't completely as good as the first Outpost. The acting is decent and the action is good. Plot and the story maybe little bit too cheesy, but it's a Nazi zombie sci-fi flick so what do you expect? god father? I'm actually surprised with the stern treatment Outpost movies receive. Not to mention when people call ''Dead Snow'' good it's just eerie. Even Frankenstein's army has 5.0 than this considering the fact that it is not as good. War of the dead has 4.0 even though it's not an awful disaster. This one actually had some cameos and references from the previous films including the Beethoven song that starts randomly playing once in a while in all three films (very good touch in my opinion) as far as I am concerned the movie is definitely a 5.0 - 6.0/10. It wouldn't hurt to let the logic fly out and enjoy a cheesy flick that can grant you certain entertainment.\n\nIMDb and Rotten Tomatoes logic: if it's not a masterpiece, it's bad. Even though IMDb is a saint compared to Rotten Tomatoes. programme.title: Cherrypicker
Ratujmy mamę!
Cherrypicker
programme.desc:
Cherrypicker: Directed by Bennet De Brabandere. With Colin Mochrie, Peter Schoelier, Heidi von Palleske, Matia Jackett. Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6969954/","name":"Cherrypicker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYwMGQxYzktYTUwZi00OWQ5LWI2NmMtMjg1YmQzOTM0ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA1MjM4MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6969954/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zalessky"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie is completely crazy","reviewBody":"Ankle Biters (or Cherrypicker) is a story about four little girls who set out on a quest to destroy their mother's love life and harm their future stepdad, Sean (Zion Forest Lee). And they do succeed in a spectacular fashion.

It starts as a spoiled child comedy and feels kinda innocent. The girls just put spider eggs in Sean's ear and put a pin in an apple he's supposed to eat. But then, well, everything goes sideways. There's gore and there's death.

I was not impressed by acting - except for the four little girls who were just great. The actresses are real-life sisters Dahlia Reed, Violet Reed, Lily Reed and Rosalie Reed, and they keep their real names in this movie. So, not much in terms of acting, and some poor dialogs. But camera work is good, and blood specal effects really deliver.

It's nuts, and it's fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"keywords":"black comedy,nudity,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1553777433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRkMTU2ZjYtMDBhYS00MjNlLWI0YzItNzVlMTUxMDcwOTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRkMTU2ZjYtMDBhYS00MjNlLWI0YzItNzVlMTUxMDcwOTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595110/","name":"Colin Mochrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2442703/","name":"Peter Schoelier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902794/","name":"Heidi von Palleske"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3185193/","name":"Bennet De Brabandere"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0812060/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3185193/","name":"Bennet De Brabandere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498500/","name":"Zion Forrest Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lone Rider
Samotny jeździec
Lone Rider
programme.desc:
Lone Rider: Directed by David S. Cass Sr.. With Lou Diamond Phillips, Stacy Keach, Vincent Spano, Marta DuBois. With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Croaker has become the most powerful man in the county. What Stu wants next is the Hattaway family business. And normally, what he wants, he gets. But when his strong-arm tactics turn deadly, Bob fights back with a vengeance. This is the West and it s going to get wild. Featuring an all-star cast including Lou Diamond Phillips, Vincent Spano, and Stacy Keach." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1092014/","name":"Lone Rider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlYTg3N2ItOGVkZC00OWEzLWE2YzktZDZkYWY4NWZmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Cr","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1092014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bares Resemblance To Anthony Mann/James Stewart Westerns","reviewBody":"In Lone Rider Lou Diamond Phillips returns to his small Texas town after war service and looks to settle down with his family. When he left there before the Civil War his parents and cousin had a prosperous ranch and a mercantile in town.

But while he's been away, a boyhood friend has become the town boss and is looking to take over the ranch and the mercantile. Lou's father Stacy Keach has borrowed for the store with a loan on the ranch which boyhood friend Vincent Spano wants paid in full.

Spano's moving on a few fronts in that town and in the tradition of many westerns the town looks for a champion and Lou fills the bill.

Lone Rider reminds me a whole lot of some of the Anthony Mann/James Stewart westerns of the Fifties. Phillips is playing a part that half a century ago Jimmy Stewart would have been playing. In fact there are distinct plot elements from The Far Country and Bend of the River in Lone Rider.

And fifty years ago Lone Rider would have been released on the big screen when westerns had more of a market and would have been acclaimed and enjoyed.

But for western fans like your's truly, we still enjoy them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Western"],"datePublished":"2008-04-12","keywords":"family business,landowner,two word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001617/","name":"Lou Diamond Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005078/","name":"Stacy Keach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001759/","name":"Vincent Spano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003180/","name":"David S. Cass Sr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209513/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0789041/","name":"Frank Sharp"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0405163/","name":"The Moguls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNzQyOTQzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTYxNjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0405163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bgpetrarca"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"How could you not like this movie?","reviewBody":"For those of you in search of a movie that will make you laugh, here is your pick. I have read comments from users saying that this movie "didn't seem real" or "wasn't believable". To you, I ask: What did you think you were watching? I saw this screening at the Newport Film Festival and thought it was amazing. Some movies (gasp) are out there to entertain and this does just that... fantastically. It is a story that laughs at the ups and downs of the human experience while portraying the sometimes very harsh reality of middle-class struggle. It gives us a story we recognize to a certain extent, but garnishes it with a great variety of endearing characters. As an example the group of "guys" has a wonderfully accepted gay guy who asked the guys to call him MOOSE. (played oh-so-well by Ted Danson) We see the standard group of small town guys, going nowhere with their lives, yet they aren't the stereotypical unrelatable morons of modern day cinema; They, in a very round about and strange way, have morals and try to do well in life, despite their position. Go see this movie... it is a wonderful treat and a great time at the theatre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6326,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-04-28","keywords":"small town,loser,adult filmmaking,pornographic film,hot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Amateurs","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2207580441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Amateurs"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001101/","name":"Ted Danson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001592/","name":"Joe Pantoliano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010508/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107069/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

96 minut
96 Minutes
programme.desc: 96 Minutes: Directed by Aimee Lagos. With Christian Serratos, Brittany Snow, David Oyelowo, Evan Ross. The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1641385/","name":"96 Minutes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjQ2ODM5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM3NDk1Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1641385/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cosmo_tiger"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":""Crash" with teens. I liked it much more then I expected to. Pretty emotional and powerful. A good watch. I say B+","reviewBody":""I never should have gotten out of bed this morning." Carley (Snow) is about to graduate from college and her father isn't interested in attending. Lena (Serratos) just found out that her boyfriend is cheating on her. Dre (Ross) just found out that he will be able to graduate high school and finally has found a way out of gang life. Kevin (Trautmann) wants nothing more then to join a gang. When him and Dre get into an argument that ends up in carjacking the car that belongs to Carley with Lena has a passenger. The best way to describe this is "Crash" with teens. Total strangers who are all connected by one event that threatens to ruin all of them. This is very moving, powerful and intense. I highly recommend this one but much like "Crash" it's not really one you can watch over and over. The acting is great and the movie is a mix of flashbacks and current events that really make you feel connected to the characters and find your self sad and angry all at once. Overall, a surprisingly good movie that deserves to be watched. I give it a B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-14","keywords":"child with a gun,shooting a woman,woman in jeopardy,carjacking,atlanta georgia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"96 Minutes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1981719321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for 96 Minutes"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811242/","name":"Brittany Snow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1963091/","name":"Evan Ross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2759438/","name":"Sharon Conley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0276411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0321415/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Edge of Winter
U progu zimy
Edge of Winter
programme.desc:
Edge of Winter: Directed by Rob Connolly. With Joel Kinnaman, Percy Hynes White, Tom Holland, Rachelle Lefevre. When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4526546/","name":"Edge of Winter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzOTg5NDE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM5MTA1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4526546/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vegicat"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Acting, Decent Movie","reviewBody":"No idea why people are harshing on this movie. Yes, the plot is simple, but that's because it's not a horror flick or action flick - - it's a psychological family drama thriller. As in, tense.

There's beautiful scenery, minimal music, and other than a few scenes (not going to spoil that), most of what happens is fairly straightforward. Joel Kinnaman, looking a bit haggard, (the delicious co-star of The Killing) delivers top-notch acting, as do both of the boys. Their relationship and interaction is believable, and thankfully, there isn't any annoying precociousness or preciousness in the kid's characters. 

I'm not sure what people were expecting from the movie, but after reading some of the reviews/comments, I watched it anyway, and I wasn't disappointed. If you're looking for something with a lot of violence or gore, or some feel-good story with a dramatic ending, this isn't the film for you. If you are looking for a somewhat bleak story line with great acting, then check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3966,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"brother brother relationship,father son relationship,teenage boy,winter,snow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060498713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recently divorced and laid off from his job, Elliot Baker (Joel Kinnaman, Suicide Squad; Run All Night) is desperate to spend more time bonding with his sons, Bradley (Tom Holland, Captain America: Civil War) and Caleb (Percy Hynes White, Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb). What starts as family day trip to teach his boys how to shoot turns into a nightmare when they become stranded. As they retreat to a desolate cabin, Elliot's mounting fear of losing custody pushes him to the edge. IMDb data; ttnr: 4526546, Title: Edge of Winter, --- Description: Edge of Winter: Directed by Rob Connolly. With Joel Kinnaman, Percy Hynes White, Tom Holland, Rachelle Lefevre. When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4526546/","name":"Edge of Winter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzOTg5NDE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM5MTA1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4526546/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"vegicat","dateCreated":"2016-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Acting, Decent Movie","reviewBody":"No idea why people are harshing on this movie. Yes, the plot is simple, but that's because it's not a horror flick or action flick - - it's a psychological family drama thriller. As in, tense.

There's beautiful scenery, minimal music, and other than a few scenes (not going to spoil that), most of what happens is fairly straightforward. Joel Kinnaman, looking a bit haggard, (the delicious co-star of The Killing) delivers top-notch acting, as do both of the boys. Their relationship and interaction is believable, and thankfully, there isn't any annoying precociousness or preciousness in the kid's characters. 

I'm not sure what people were expecting from the movie, but after reading some of the reviews/comments, I watched it anyway, and I wasn't disappointed. If you're looking for something with a lot of violence or gore, or some feel-good story with a dramatic ending, this isn't the film for you. If you are looking for a somewhat bleak story line with great acting, then check it out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3966,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"brother brother relationship,father son relationship,teenage boy,winter,snow","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060498713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recently divorced and laid off from his job, Elliot Baker (Joel Kinnaman, Suicide Squad; Run All Night) is desperate to spend more time bonding with his sons, Bradley (Tom Holland, Captain America: Civil War) and Caleb (Percy Hynes White, Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb). What starts as family day trip to teach his boys how to shoot turns into a nightmare when they become stranded. As they retreat to a desolate cabin, Elliot's mounting fear of losing custody pushes him to the edge. The brothers quickly realize that the man responsible for keeping them safe has now become their biggest threat.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172478/","name":"Joel Kinnaman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4007171/","name":"Percy Hynes White","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232635/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496439/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593227/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1954504/","name":"Kyle Mann","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: First Blood
Rambo: Pierwsza krew
First Blood
programme.desc: First Blood: Directed by Ted Kotcheff. With Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Brian Dennehy, Bill McKinney. A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083944/","name":"First Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmOWU2YWMtZGUzZi00YzRhLWJjNDAtYTUwNWVkNDcyZmU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083944/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Regalian_Captain"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The only good rambo movie","reviewBody":"How people can call this the worst one of the series or just a bad movie in general is beyond me. The action is actually believable and not something out of a video game. And the storyline is good and paints a good picture of life in America after the Vietnam war. Following the tale of the best of the best it is certainly not the best but very good. Better yet is the laughs that come from watching the bad cops get theirs. The only I have to complain about this movie is that the sequels were atrocious and painful. This is often looked over excellent movie that puts many other in the genre to shame. Many of you who find it boring are just gore junkies who thrive off of cheap explosions and a plethora of bullets in the air. Take it for a man trying to survive, not bringing down a whole army.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239817,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1982-10-22","keywords":"abuse of power,corrupt sheriff,veteran,corrupt cop,bad cop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rambo: First Blood","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1402863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467646/","name":"Ted Kotcheff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0779514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0231747/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0606251/","name":"David Morrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468997/","name":"Michael Kozoll"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755266/","name":"William Sackheim"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Nie zadzieraj z fryzjerem
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc:
You Don't Mess with the Zohan: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Adam Sandler, John Turturro, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Nick Swardson. An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0960144/","name":"You Don't Mess with the Zohan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE2MzEzNDc5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYxOTA3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0960144/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KDeRuy"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sandler Sandler Sandler","reviewBody":"While it has some funny moments. It has a lot less.

It's one of those movies that would have been great in 1998. But falls short in 2008. Its just the same gimmick that has been done by 'Happy Madison Productions'.

Reminds me of: Chuck and Larry, Strange Wilderness, The Benchwarmers, Dickie Roberts, 50 first dates, Etc.

It's just well.....for lack of a better word. Stupid. It might have you grabbing your sides in 98', but when you watch it, its somewhat like, "OK, let me guess, Rob Schneider is going to pop up and say something dumb with a 'pause for laughter' moment?" Yup.

Is Sandler going to do a stupid voice the whole movie and end on a 'touching theme'?. Yup.

Acting is good, I will give it that. However, if you have seen any Adam Sandler movie, then you won't be surprised with his acting choices. Same choices, different accent.

Nothing against Sandler, his movies were great.......in 98'

I'd wait for DVD,...if that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":196592,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2008-06-06","keywords":"hair stylist,palestinian,funny arab,arab israeli conflict,super strength","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"You Don't Mess with the Zohan","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1625489689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwNjA5NjEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTEwODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwNjA5NjEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTEwODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"You Don't Mess with the Zohan - 30 second spot"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001806/","name":"John Turturro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004825/","name":"Emmanuelle Chriqui"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0806912/","name":"Robert Smigel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

It has a lot less.

It's one of those movies that would have been great in 1998. But falls short in 2008. Its just the same gimmick that has been done by 'Happy Madison Productions'.

Reminds me of: Chuck and Larry, Strange Wilderness, The Benchwarmers, Dickie Roberts, 50 first dates, Etc.

It's just well.....for lack of a better word. Stupid. It might have you grabbing your sides in 98', but when you watch it, its somewhat like, "OK, let me guess, Rob Schneider is going to pop up and say something dumb with a 'pause for laughter' moment?" Yup.

Is Sandler going to do a stupid voice the whole movie and end on a 'touching theme'?. Yup.

Acting is good, I will give it that. However, if you have seen any Adam Sandler movie, then you won't be surprised with his acting choices. Same choices, different accent.

Nothing against Sandler, his movies were great.......in 98'

I'd wait for DVD,...if that.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":196592,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2008-06-06","keywords":"hair stylist,palestinian,funny arab,arab israeli conflict,super strength","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"You Don't Mess with the Zohan","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1625489689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwNjA5NjEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTEwODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwNjA5NjEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTEwODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"You Don't Mess with the Zohan - 30 second spot","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001806/","name":"John Turturro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004825/","name":"Emmanuelle Chriqui"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0806912/","name":"Robert Smigel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"],"duration":"PT1H53M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Punisher
Punisher
The Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher: Directed by Jonathan Hensleigh. With A. Russell Andrews, Omar Avila, James Carpinello, Mark Collie. An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0330793/","name":"The Punisher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NjcwMTQxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5ODkwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0330793/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bumblebeeman777"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed everything about this dark tale.","reviewBody":"The Punisher put my faith back into revenge movies. The action in this film is unbelievable and grim. I found myself not wanting the story to end. Many of the movies based on superheroes in a comic book tend not to sticks gritty and real. This one was and then some. The movie has surpassed my expectation and I certainly look forward Punisher 2.\n\nThe next film sets itself up for a kick butt start. They should take a page from X2 or the Lethal Weapon series and just open the next film with a wild battle. You can grab the viewer right away and still tell your full story right after. I hope the entire cast as well as the director returns because they crafted one quality origin story here. In summary, I enjoyed everything about this dark tale."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155338,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-05-05","keywords":"vigilante,revenge,family reunion,female nudity,origin of hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Punisher (2004)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4236444185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg1ZWIyNGQtMjdkNy00YjkzLWE3MDEtZWM0YjYxM2VlMmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg1ZWIyNGQtMjdkNy00YjkzLWE3MDEtZWM0YjYxM2VlMmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film based on the Marvel comic book character"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005048/","name":"Thomas Jane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000526/","name":"Samantha Mathis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289833/","name":"Michael France"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

Bakery/cafe owner Hannah is also an amateur sleuth solving murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13174748/","name":"Murder, She Baked","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU0NTYxYWUtNjdkYS00ZjcyLWJlNjUtNjdlNjM3NjdlZDQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUwNDU1MTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bakery/cafe owner Hannah is also an amateur sleuth solving murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13174748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"I think this is my favorite of the Hallmark Mystery series.","reviewBody":"I absolutely love Hannah Swensen and the Murder She Baked Mystery Series. The curious and observant single baker Hannah is endearing and her chemistry with both Mike and Norman is spot on. Her mom is fabulous as the meddling mother...along with her serious Eden Lake police officer brother-in-law and co-conspirator sister.

I'd love to try some of her baked goods and I was inspired to read the books this series was based on.

My three favorite Hallmark Mystery Series remain: Hannah Swensen's Murder she Baked, Aurora Teagarden Mysteries, and Mystery 101.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":316,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"genre":["Mystery"],"datePublished":"2015-05-02","keywords":"tv mini series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842081/","name":"Alison Sweeney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558950/","name":"Cameron Mathison"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018271/","name":"Barbara Niven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799012/","name":"Nancey Silvers"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fortress 2
Forteca 2
Fortress 2
programme.desc: Fortress 2: Directed by Geoff Murphy. With Christopher Lambert, Aidan Ostrogovich, David Roberson, Liz May Brice. 7 years after the original Fortress movie, Brennick along with the rebels are captured and sent to a new, more sophisticated fortress prison, in outer space." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0179183/","name":"Fortress 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmNlNmVmNGYtODJlMi00NzZmLTk2ZTAtYmUxMzJjNzcwM2U5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"7 years after the original Fortress movie, Brennick along with the rebels are captured and sent to a new, more sophisticated fortress prison, in outer space.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0179183/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TBJCSKCNRRQTreviews"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fortress 2: this time, Lambert is in space","reviewBody":"Christopher Lambert; the king of newer B-movies. The guy has been in every(I think) Highlander movie so far, despite the fact that only the first was particularly popular. He's done so many B-movies that one has to wonder if he is aware that the films are bad and doesn't care, or if he really doesn't realize their quality(or, rather, lack thereof). Here, he returns in a sequel to the fairly low-budget B-movie action-science fiction flick, Fortress. In the first one, the prison was huge, and underneath the ground. Here, it's... well, it's still huge, but this time, it's in outer space. I guess the writer thought, hey, the first time, it was underneath the ground... the only place that could be worse than that would be outer space. I hope he's right... I surely do, because if he is, maybe we won't see anymore half-cooked action-sci-fi flicks like this. Lambert portrays the exact same character, which I suppose is good, as he was a decent character in the first. A few somewhat big names also join the cast, most noticeably Pam Grier. The cast of characters from the first are pretty much remade(apart from Lambert himself), meaning that the new cast pretty much just fills the shoes of the characters from the first(anyone who knows how the first ended knows why). Unfortunately, that means that the film seems more like an overblown remake with the same guy portraying the lead, rather than a sequel. The hacker from the first(who was a neurotic, nervous guy, beautifully portrayed by great horror-talent, Jeffrey Combs) is replaced by an annoying black-guy stereotype. The female lead is replaced by a girl from the resistance(which Lambert's character is said to be a member of as well... odd... I don't remember that from the first... does that mean he joined the resistance after he got a kid? Who'd do that?), instead of his wife as it was in the first... apparently mainly because the scriptwriter couldn't find a good way to capture both Lambert and the wife-character, without capturing the kid. The Men-Tel prison commander(who was played by the cool bad-guy actor, Kurtwood Smith, from RoboCop fame) is now an annoying wimp with a ridiculous British accent that really gets on your nerves(as opposed to the cool Smith, who was a menacing and threatening presence). The plot is a rehash of the first. The pacing isn't particularly good. The very scenes in the movie seems to be(for the most part) remakes of the scenes of the original(talk about lack of originality...) and the action is mostly just rehashes of the first, just made a little less exciting(remember those way-cool machine guns with three barrels in the first? They're replaced with dull futuristic-looking stick-stun-guns). The special effects are decent at best. The script is a weak rehash of the first, with a few added sub-plots, none of which being particularly good... most of them are just there to keep the film going, or put it an action scene, in order to distract the audience from the poor writing. The dialog is pretty bad, with one or two exceptions. All in all, the film is just a tame rehash of everything the first was(which isn't even a lot). Somebody took the first film, said, "hey, this is popular... but it's not very good... how about if we try to do something of even lesser quality and see if people will like it?" Probably writer/producer/actor John Flock, who, going by the plot and the writing of this film, really is as dumb as he looks. I recommend this only to huge fans of the first Fortress, Lambert or B-movies. Everyone else; don't bother. There's a million better ways to spend 90 minutes, and there's at least as many reasons not to see this film. 5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6871,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2000-03-02","keywords":"punishment,dome,breasts,buttocks,female frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fortress 2: Re-Entry","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1424294169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWZkNGZlZjAtZTE3Yi00OWZkLTgxNDYtMGZiN2I1NTI0YzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWZkNGZlZjAtZTE3Yi00OWZkLTgxNDYtMGZiN2I1NTI0YzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from TriStar Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869728/","name":"Beth Toussaint"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0308606/","name":"Willie Garson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614276/","name":"Geoff Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048299/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058145/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270686/","name":"Steven Feinberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0624639/","name":"Troy Neighbors"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0282472/","name":"John Flock"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Desperado
Desperado
programme.desc: Desperado: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Joaquim de Almeida, Cheech Marin. Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112851/","name":"Desperado","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA0NDMyYTgtMDgxOC00NGE0LWJkOTQtNDRjMjEzZmU0ZTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112851/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chrysanthepop"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch Out, El Mariachi Is Back!","reviewBody":"Rodriguez follows up 'El Mariachi' with 'Desperado'. Many seem to have preferred the raw look that 'El Mariachi' had and while 'Desperado' is more 'sophisticated' in the making and more polished, that doesn't prevent it from being an awesome action entertainer. For me, it was just as much fun as 'El Mariachi'. Rodriguez does what he does best. He already mentioned that his Mariachi films are a tribute to the western cinema that names like Sergio Leone and Clint Eastwood defined and 'Desperado' works perfectly with its comic book story, quirky characters and over-the-top action sequences. Moving at a rapid pace, the direction and editing are top notch. The cinematography is brilliant too. Antonio Banderas does a good job taking over the role from Carlos Gallardo (who sort of plays his sidekick in this one). However, it is Salma Hayek that steals the show even though the story is dominated by El Mariachi. As Carolina, she is sensual, witty, charming and quite clever too. Hayek delivers a very natural performance and owns each and every one of her scenes. In addition, there are some wonderful cameos by Cheech Marin, Quentin Tarantino, Steve Buscemi and Danny Trejo. Overall, 'Desperado' is full throttle entertainment. This is what an action entertainer is supposed to be."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1995-08-25","keywords":"contemporary western,mexican,one against many,lone wolf,musician","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperado","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3315663129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI0MjU0YWQtZDgyZi00Y2NmLTliOGItNTEwZDg5OTc4YmE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI0MjU0YWQtZDgyZi00Y2NmLTliOGItNTEwZDg5OTc4YmE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"text os"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0021835/","name":"Joaquim de Almeida"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0870559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

He already mentioned that his Mariachi films are a tribute to the western cinema that names like Sergio Leone and Clint Eastwood defined and 'Desperado' works perfectly with its comic book story, quirky characters and over-the-top action sequences. Moving at a rapid pace, the direction and editing are top notch. The cinematography is brilliant too. Antonio Banderas does a good job taking over the role from Carlos Gallardo (who sort of plays his sidekick in this one). However, it is Salma Hayek that steals the show even though the story is dominated by El Mariachi. As Carolina, she is sensual, witty, charming and quite clever too. Hayek delivers a very natural performance and owns each and every one of her scenes. In addition, there are some wonderful cameos by Cheech Marin, Quentin Tarantino, Steve Buscemi and Danny Trejo. Overall, 'Desperado' is full throttle entertainment. This is what an action entertainer is supposed to be.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1995-08-25","keywords":"contemporary western,mexican,one against many,lone wolf,musician","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperado","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3315663129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI0MjU0YWQtZDgyZi00Y2NmLTliOGItNTEwZDg5OTc4YmE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI0MjU0YWQtZDgyZi00Y2NmLTliOGItNTEwZDg5OTc4YmE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"text os","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0021835/","name":"Joaquim de Almeida"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0870559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"],"duration":"PT1H44M"</script><metacontent="

A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0758790/","name":"The Tudors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI2MDU0MjEzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA1NTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lilwolfe006"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not quite like Rome, but in the spirit of historically set series, a good replacement","reviewBody":"With the proposed ending of Rome - I think a lot of viewers will automatically turn to The Tudors as a replacement. I have watched the first episode and find that the acting and set alone can pull a viewer in. It is different than Rome, but the same core passions of humanity are present.

I am deeply saddened that Rome will be ending after such a short run, and I think that were it not, The Tudors would find far more competition. As it is, both shows are proving that there is an audience for historical dramas and I hope such endeavors continue in the future.

The Tudors has a quality cast with attractive actors for both genders to attach to. I cannot make an honest opinion yet on the plots and direction of the series until I see more of it, but the imagery alone is a good start for this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71645,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-04-01","keywords":"sex scene,king,royalty,king henry viii,english court","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112390/","name":"Anthony Brophy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0386694/","name":"Michael Hirst"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Tudors: Season 4: The Final Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3776092441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Tudors: The Final Season"}}</script><metacontent="

A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0758790/","name":"The Tudors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI2MDU0MjEzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA1NTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758790/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lilwolfe006","dateCreated":"2007-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not quite like Rome, but in the spirit of historically set series, a good replacement","reviewBody":"With the proposed ending of Rome - I think a lot of viewers will automatically turn to The Tudors as a replacement. I have watched the first episode and find that the acting and set alone can pull a viewer in. It is different than Rome, but the same core passions of humanity are present.

I am deeply saddened that Rome will be ending after such a short run, and I think that were it not, The Tudors would find far more competition. As it is, both shows are proving that there is an audience for historical dramas and I hope such endeavors continue in the future.

The Tudors has a quality cast with attractive actors for both genders to attach to. I cannot make an honest opinion yet on the plots and direction of the series until I see more of it, but the imagery alone is a good start for this series.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71645,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-04-01","keywords":"sex scene,king,royalty,king henry viii,english court","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112390/","name":"Anthony Brophy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078130/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082215/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0386694/","name":"Michael Hirst"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Tudors: Season 4: The Final Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3776092441","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Tudors: The Final Season"</script><metacontent="

A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0758790/","name":"The Tudors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI2MDU0MjEzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA1NTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lilwolfe006"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not quite like Rome, but in the spirit of historically set series, a good replacement","reviewBody":"With the proposed ending of Rome - I think a lot of viewers will automatically turn to The Tudors as a replacement. I have watched the first episode and find that the acting and set alone can pull a viewer in. It is different than Rome, but the same core passions of humanity are present.

I am deeply saddened that Rome will be ending after such a short run, and I think that were it not, The Tudors would find far more competition. As it is, both shows are proving that there is an audience for historical dramas and I hope such endeavors continue in the future.

The Tudors has a quality cast with attractive actors for both genders to attach to. I cannot make an honest opinion yet on the plots and direction of the series until I see more of it, but the imagery alone is a good start for this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71645,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-04-01","keywords":"sex scene,king,royalty,king henry viii,english court","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112390/","name":"Anthony Brophy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0386694/","name":"Michael Hirst"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Tudors: Season 4: The Final Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3776092441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Tudors: The Final Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Blade Runner 2049: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Ryan Gosling, Dave Bautista, Robin Wright, Mark Arnold. Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1856101/","name":"Blade Runner 2049","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA1Njg4NzYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5NjU3MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1856101/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jillbeckinheim7"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Original was better","reviewBody":"At its core it remains a mystery and it's all the better for it. I think the most impressive thing about it was its commitment to building on the mythology set forth by the original. It managed to expand on the original and give us answers to what happened to characters after it in ways that felt clever, fresh, and still faithful to it. It manages to be about the continuation of certain events in the first film while creating a new fascinating character at its core and manages to tell the new character's arc brilliantly. To reiterate, it's very well written, managing to avoid the clichés that usually transpire in films like this. Villeneuve has quickly become one of the best filmmakers currently working and this is only another example of his talent. However, the original was much better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":513093,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-10-05","keywords":"female nudity,environmental damage,corporatist,capitalism,sex scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"At Cinemas Now","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3362371865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MjY3MTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE0NjU3MzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MjY3MTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE0NjU3MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331516/","name":"Ryan Gosling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1869101/","name":"Ana de Armas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898288/","name":"Denis Villeneuve"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266684/","name":"Hampton Fancher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001140/","name":"Philip K.
