programme.title: The Weather Man
Prognoza na życie
The Weather Man
programme.desc:
The Weather Man: Directed by Gore Verbinski. With Nicolas Cage, Michael Caine, Hope Davis, Gemmenne de la Peña. A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0384680/","name":"The Weather Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NzAxMTE3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDAwMjY3._V1_.jpg","description":"A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0384680/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KissEnglishPasto"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Weather Man: The Unpredictable and The Grayness of Being Human","reviewBody":"From PASTO, COLOMBIA-Via: L. A. CA; CALI, COLOMBIA+ORLANDO, FL The ONLY Tony Kiss Castillo on FaceBook!---------------------------------

************May Contain a Couple MINOR Spoilers************** The TV promo trailer for "The Weather Man" did nothing to capture my interest. It looked like another of those "Light" comedies, which usually just aren't that good. Via recommendations from a few of my students, I decided to check it out. Wow!..Sometimes Hollywood marketing teams are so utterly clueless! In this case, the trailer shown on TV and the film projected in the theater had absolutely nothing in common with one another!

Director Gore Verbinski (Pirates of the Caribbean, The Ring) has given us a film that at first glance seems simple enough, but which ends up being as absolutely unpredictable as the science of meteorology itself. David Spritz (Nicolas Cage) is a divorced meteorologist who has attained considerable success on a professional level, but whose personal life, despite his perpetual fantasies to the contrary, is an explosive and unmitigated disaster.

As the perturbed and ever-reflexive protagonist, Nicolas Cage (National Treasure, Lord of War) positions himself in the eye of his own tormented life, and is likewise the title character of the film. Like almost every other human being, Spritz is unable to come to grips with the stark reality that the dark clouds constantly present in his life are creations of his own device. They are clearly the consequence of his own actions and his particularly obstinate way of being and not merely products of some uncontrollable, mystical fate.

While growing up, young David always loomed in the shadow of his famous Pulitzer-Prize winning father, Robert Spritz, played masterfully by Michael Caine. It seems that communication between father and son was never really what it should have been. Similarly, David leaves a lot to be desired in the area of warm and communicative interaction with all the important people in his life: His son, daughter, and of course, his ex- wife. David's disconnect is that he fantasizes that love and affection from his loved ones is linked directly to his level of professional success and recognition.

The Weather Man, despite being a great European style film, suffers from some excesses. In order to drive home the fact that David often walks rather aimlessly through life, it isn't indispensable to permit the film to meander and lose its focus for a few minutes as well! Nor do I believe that the constant, non-stop profanity to be consistent with the characters nor with the overall tone of the film. But if you enjoy European flavored cinema and movies which project life through a slightly surreal philosophical prism, surely this Weather Man will make your daySunny and Clear!

8* STARS*...ENJOY/DISFRUTELA!

Any comments, questions, or observations, in English o en Español, are most welcome!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-10-28","keywords":"bare chested teenage boy,gender in title,woman on top sex,woman uses crutches,weatherman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Weather Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3441927705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjFkZWRhODctMzcxZC00YTQyLTlmMmItMzYwNTIzNGYyNTdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjFkZWRhODctMzcxZC00YTQyLTlmMmItMzYwNTIzNGYyNTdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204706/","name":"Hope Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893659/","name":"Gore Verbinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179988/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175726/","name":"Steve Conrad"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

Mongolski łącznik
The Mongolian Connection
programme.desc: Africa Mia: Directed by Richard Minier, Edouard Salier. 1964. In the midst of the Cold War, ten young promising musicians from Mali are sent to Cuba to study music and strengthen cultural links between the two socialist regimes. They invent a whole new genre: Afro- Cuban Music and become the iconic group 'Las Maravillas de Mali'. New Year's Eve 2000. Richard Minier, a French music producer meets a former member of the band in Bamako and decides to bring the band back together." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10506096/","name":"Africa Mia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU2NzM3NWMtN2Q0ZC00OWMyLWFjOTEtZjQxY2RiMjBjZDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"1964. programme.title: Baghdad in My Shadow
Bagdad, mój cień
Baghdad in My Shadow
programme.desc:
Baghdad in My Shadow: Directed by Samir. With Haitham Abdel-Razzaq, Zahraa Ghandour, Waseem Abbas, Maxim Mehmet. "Abu Nawas" is a trendy café and popular hangout for artists, communists and gay Iraqi exiles in London, it's close to the Salafist Mosque. When Nasseer, a fanatic religious youth and nephew of poet Taufiq, attacks his uncle's friends he sets into action a course of events that will turn everyone's life upside down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6864088/","name":"Baghdad in My Shadow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY5ODFkM2MtN2U2NC00MzNkLWJkNjEtNTdkODE4NDUzYmYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTkyOTA4MjM@._V1_.jpg","description":""Abu Nawas" is a trendy café and popular hangout for artists, communists and gay Iraqi exiles in London, it's close to the Salafist Mosque. When Nasseer, a fanatic religious youth and nephew of poet Taufiq, attacks his uncle's friend","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6864088/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"onefineday36"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Complex subject entertainingly presented","reviewBody":"This film deals with issues such as refugees, radicalization, casual racism and sexism, and general hypocrisy in all of us. It's a contentious subject, and almost impossible not to offend some section of the society. But I think the film did a decent job while maintaining it entertaining as a commercial film.

The form factor as the crime investigation drama is a bit of cliche. I understand it keeps the film entertaining, but I honestly think it's the weaker side of it overall. The depiction of the super serious, lone-hero type interviewee and cold investigators in grey rainy London are carbon copies of the recent crime TV dramas, and feels over-done... But the different lives gathered in the cafe are lively and multi-layered. Samir, the old hostess of the cafe, especially steals the scenes with her bold, biting and funny remarks. Characters like her, who could very well have been in arms with other Parisian students during the '68 revolution, and the old Iraqi music shows on TV represent the past of Iraq most people in the West do not know, while more recent Hussein era is represented by Taufik's past and in the form of ex-husband of Amal.

Other issues are also represented more than simplistic way; The bigotry of the extremist preacher is clear, but even the more liberal minded guys are not free from subtler sexism and homophobia. The form of racism the Iraqis have to experience also ranges from the direct violence to much more casual ones from the local English who fail to recognize their love interests are more than what they see present in London - they are also their past, their culture and community. And that applies exactly the same beyond their individual lives. Without understanding the complex texture of the past and present, there will be no solution to the issues like refugees, religion, radicalization and bigotry.

It's not a documentary or a reportage. It's ultimately meant to be an entertaining commercial flick, and it does it decently. But it manages to touch on complex issues involved, and leaves a lot of things to think about beyond its running time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-09-30","keywords":"place in title,london england,male objectification,cafe,dance scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"BAGHDAD IN MY SHADOW - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi777632793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjExYmE1NmEtZTE4OS00MWFhLTk5NmQtNDhlZDUwMjdmNjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjExYmE1NmEtZTE4OS00MWFhLTk5NmQtNDhlZDUwMjdmNjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"a film by Samir"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8638837/","name":"Haitham Abdel-Razzaq"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8976505/","name":"Zahraa Ghandour"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4676537/","name":"Waseem Abbas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759848/","name":"Samir"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035815/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066704/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759848/","name":"Samir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2187487/","name":"Furat al Jamil"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

When Nasseer, a fanatic religious youth and nephew of poet Taufiq, attacks his uncle's friend","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6864088/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"onefineday36","dateCreated":"2021-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Complex subject entertainingly presented","reviewBody":"This film deals with issues such as refugees, radicalization, casual racism and sexism, and general hypocrisy in all of us. It's a contentious subject, and almost impossible not to offend some section of the society. But I think the film did a decent job while maintaining it entertaining as a commercial film.

The form factor as the crime investigation drama is a bit of cliche. I understand it keeps the film entertaining, but I honestly think it's the weaker side of it overall. The depiction of the super serious, lone-hero type interviewee and cold investigators in grey rainy London are carbon copies of the recent crime TV dramas, and feels over-done... But the different lives gathered in the cafe are lively and multi-layered. Samir, the old hostess of the cafe, especially steals the scenes with her bold, biting and funny remarks. Characters like her, who could very well have been in arms with other Parisian students during the '68 revolution, and the old Iraqi music shows on TV represent the past of Iraq most people in the West do not know, while more recent Hussein era is represented by Taufik's past and in the form of ex-husband of Amal.

Other issues are also represented more than simplistic way; The bigotry of the extremist preacher is clear, but even the more liberal minded guys are not free from subtler sexism and homophobia. The form of racism the Iraqis have to experience also ranges from the direct violence to much more casual ones from the local English who fail to recognize their love interests are more than what they see present in London - they are also their past, their culture and community. And that applies exactly the same beyond their individual lives. Without understanding the complex texture of the past and present, there will be no solution to the issues like refugees, religion, radicalization and bigotry.

It's not a documentary or a reportage. It's ultimately meant to be an entertaining commercial flick, and it does it decently. programme.title: No Fathers in Kashmir
Nie ma ojców w Kaszmirze
No Fathers In Kashmir
programme.desc:
No Fathers in Kashmir: Directed by Ashvin Kumar. With Anshuman Jha, Soni Razdan, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Maya Sarao. A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5279674/","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY0NWJjNmEtYmM2ZC00NGE1LTk0OGEtMThjNDE1MzdiNjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxMTY3ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5279674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beevenkat"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent performances","reviewBody":"Two kids r probing their dads disappearance in #NoFathersInKashmir. The girl is from britain n the boy is from kashmir. Just like many other muslim men, their dads too have suddenly gone missing. Their families wait endlessly, but its not clear if the men r dead or alive. Theres a scene where the girl wants a pic with a terrorist because its 'so cool' to be clicked with one. Excellent performances by zara webb, shivam raina, razdan n kharbanda. Watch it. Rating 3/5.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-04-05","keywords":"boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir !?!?! Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer of No Fathers in Kashmir directed by Oscar® nominated and 2 time national award winning Ashvin Kumar. We are now screening nationwide to critical acclaim from audiences and critics alike! 

Fabulous performances...You are transported into that world!' - Alia Bhatt

'Beautifully performed, skillfully made.' - Mira Nair 

'Deeply moving...Ashvin's acting is effective.' - Shabana Azmi

'Rarely have I see a film so brilliantly written, subtly nuanced. Every citizen of India go and watch it!' - Aparna Sen 

'Powerful...heartbreaking.' Kalki Koechlin. 

'No Fathers in Kashmir is a must watch.' - Rediff (4.5 stars)

'Zara Webb and Shivam Raina shine bright in this dark tale of a paradise at war.' - Republic World (4 stars)

'The harsh reality of Kashmir that hits you hard.' - Filmy Curry (4 stars)

'No Fathers In Kashmir must be seen by every Indian. It tells us things we don't want to hear...Tucked away in this despairing cry of muffled anguish is a tender love story which is hard to leave behind.' - Subhash K Jha (4 stars)

'Oscar-nominated Ashvin Kumar has masterfully crafted the movie which has hues of innocence, guilt, humanity, longing, politics and hope.' - Desi Martini (4 stars)

programme.title: O que arde
Siła ognia
O que arde
programme.desc: O que arde: Directed by Oliver Laxe. With Amador Arias, Benedicta Sánchez, Inazio Abrao, Elena Mar Fernández. programme.title: No Fathers in Kashmir
Nie ma ojców w Kaszmirze
No Fathers In Kashmir
programme.desc:
No Fathers in Kashmir: Directed by Ashvin Kumar. With Anshuman Jha, Soni Razdan, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Maya Sarao. A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5279674/","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY0NWJjNmEtYmM2ZC00NGE1LTk0OGEtMThjNDE1MzdiNjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxMTY3ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5279674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beevenkat"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent performances","reviewBody":"Two kids r probing their dads disappearance in #NoFathersInKashmir. The girl is from britain n the boy is from kashmir. Just like many other muslim men, their dads too have suddenly gone missing. Their families wait endlessly, but its not clear if the men r dead or alive. Theres a scene where the girl wants a pic with a terrorist because its 'so cool' to be clicked with one. Excellent performances by zara webb, shivam raina, razdan n kharbanda. Watch it. Rating 3/5.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-04-05","keywords":"boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir !?!?! Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer of No Fathers in Kashmir directed by Oscar® nominated and 2 time national award winning Ashvin Kumar. We are now screening nationwide to critical acclaim from audiences and critics alike! 

Fabulous performances...You are transported into that world!' - Alia Bhatt

'Beautifully performed, skillfully made.' - Mira Nair 

'Deeply moving...Ashvin's acting is effective.' - Shabana Azmi

'Rarely have I see a film so brilliantly written, subtly nuanced. Every citizen of India go and watch it!' - Aparna Sen 

'Powerful...heartbreaking.' Kalki Koechlin. 

'No Fathers in Kashmir is a must watch.' - Rediff (4.5 stars)

'Zara Webb and Shivam Raina shine bright in this dark tale of a paradise at war.' - Republic World (4 stars)

'The harsh reality of Kashmir that hits you hard.' - Filmy Curry (4 stars)

'No Fathers In Kashmir must be seen by every Indian. It tells us things we don't want to hear...Tucked away in this despairing cry of muffled anguish is a tender love story which is hard to leave behind.' - Subhash K Jha (4 stars)

'Oscar-nominated Ashvin Kumar has masterfully crafted the movie which has hues of innocence, guilt, humanity, longing, politics and hope.' - Desi Martini (4 stars)

The Cast -

programme.title: Lola vers la mer
Lola
Lola vers la mer
programme.desc: Lola vers la mer: Directed by Laurent Micheli. With Mya Bollaers, Benoît Magimel, Els Deceukelier, Sami Outalbali. Lola, 18 years old, bleach blonde hair, lives in a foster home with Samir, her only friend. Impulsive and lonely, she is trying to get her diploma as a veterinary assistant. When her mother passes away, her father Phillip makes sure that Lola will miss the ceremony. Two years before that, Philip was throwing her out of the family home: at the time, Lola was still Lionel - Philippe is determined to fulfill Catherine's last wish: to be dispersed to the North Sea, in the dunes of her childhood home. Lola on the other hand is furious against her father, but she will not leave her mother alone in this last journey. So they take off together, both unwilling to share a car but determined to take Catherine home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8356178/","name":"Lola vers la mer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ2YTYyZTctYzM0OS00N2U3LTk3MDAtZmQ2MDFiMmFlODJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE0NTk0MjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lola, 18 years old, bleach blonde hair, lives in a foster home with Samir, her only friend. Although the overall style of this film is rather subdued, it conveys the pain and the horror the boy experiences very intensely. programme.title: Ojciec chrzestny 3
programme.desc: Rok 1979. Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) próbuje prowadzić legalne interesy. Czeka też na wyróżnienie przez Watykan prestiżowym odznaczeniem za filantropię. Życie prywatne nie układa mu się jednak najlepiej. Jest po rozwodzie, a jego syn - zamiast kontynuować dzieło ojca - wybiera karierę artysty scenicznego. Na przejęcie władzy liczy natomiast Vincent Mancini (Andy Garcia), nieślubny syn starszego brata Michaela, Sonny'ego. Niebawem młody krewny zaczyna uwodzić jego córkę Mary (Sofia Coppola).

programme.title: Big Fan
Kibic
Big Fan
programme.desc:
Big Fan: Directed by Robert Siegel. With Patton Oswalt, Kevin Corrigan, Michael Rapaport, Marcia Jean Kurtz. A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1228953/","name":"Big Fan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNjQxNTczMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjc5MTA3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1228953/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016"},"dateCreated":"2010-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kept afloat by Oswalt's fascinating performance, which is hard to shake off even after the credits are over.","reviewBody":"Paul is in his mid-thirties, single, and still living at home with his mother. He works as a parking lot attendant in New York, and is content to sit in his booth at night writing down passionate, articulate rants, so that when he goes home he can call a local radio sports show and prove his fanaticism for the Giants, his favorite football team.

Paul is played by Patton Oswalt, one of the funniest stand-up comedians alive, and what he does in this film is really quite remarkable. He creates a fully convincing and pathetic loser, and is unafraid to reveal all the character's lowest points. If this were an Adam Sandler comedy we'd probably have scenes showing us how misunderstood and sweet Paul is, so we can understand that he's the one we're meant to root for, but Oswalt's Paul isn't so cleancut. He treats his family like crap and has terrible mood swings; he only seems truly happy when he's in his element: either witnessing a Giants win or ranting to strangers on the radio. The fact that he must write his speeches down beforehand, and preps himself for hours in advance of calling, says everything.

Paul gets in trouble when he spots a Giants quarterback at a gas station in a shady neighborhood and follows him into a NYC nightclub. After an awkward introduction, Paul makes the mistake of mentioning that he's been following the sports star and his entourage for the past few hours, and the drunken athlete reacts by beating him senseless. Three days later Paul is hospitalized and the police want his statement -- but he suddenly "can't remember" anything that happened, desperately hoping the Giants won't be forced to suspend their star athlete. But that's just the beginning of his problems.

Big Fan is the directorial debut of Robert D. Siegel, who wrote last year's sports-themed The Wrestler. Both movies concern the plights of apparent losers, the biggest difference being Mickey Rourke's 'Ram' actually had a life at one point, whereas Paul's existence is experienced vicariously. Everyone around him tries to offer a better life, whether it's jobs or moving into his own place, but he firmly rejects them. In Paul's eyes, this is his life. He is perfectly content to be discontent, and the movie's lack of transformation for its character will undoubtedly alienate some viewers.

And, put bluntly, Big Fan is not as strong or poignant as The Wrestler. Siegel is not as capable a director as Darren Aronofsky, and the story -- despite clocking in at under an hour and a half -- does tend to meander a few times. But it is endearingly bleak, honest and real, and kept afloat by Oswalt's fascinating performance, which is hard to shake off even after the credits are over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9296,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-09-18","keywords":"dark humor,man wears underwear,adult child lives at home,new york giants football,new york city","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180984/","name":"Kevin Corrigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557909/","name":"Robert Siegel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130608/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0266284/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251178/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557909/","name":"Robert Siegel"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

And, put bluntly, Big Fan is not as strong or poignant as The Wrestler. Siegel is not as capable a director as Darren Aronofsky, and the story -- despite clocking in at under an hour and a half -- does tend to meander a few times. But it is endearingly bleak, honest and real, and kept afloat by Oswalt's fascinating performance, which is hard to shake off even after the credits are over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9296,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-09-18","keywords":"dark humor,man wears underwear,adult child lives at home,new york giants football,new york city","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180984/","name":"Kevin Corrigan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557909/","name":"Robert Siegel"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130608/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0266284/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251178/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557909/","name":"Robert Siegel"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: End of Sentence
Ostatnia wyprawa
End of Sentence
programme.desc: End of Sentence: Directed by Elfar Adalsteins. With John Hawkes, Logan Lerman, Sarah Bolger, Andrea Irvine. After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sean steps out of prison the last thing on his mind is a foreign road trip with his alienated father. What he needs is a fresh start in California. But when his travel plans collapse he reluctantly accepts his father's proposal in return for a ticket to the West Coast and a promise that they never have to see each other again. Between a disconcerting Irish wake, the surfacing of an old flame, the pick up of a pretty hitchhiker and plenty of unresolved issues, the journey becomes a little more than father and son had bargained for." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6910006/","name":"End of Sentence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVmOTkwMjEtOWQ1Ny00Nzc2LWJmNmEtMWVkYTAxNzc0YWJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg4NzM5NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sea","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6910006/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"amirmustafaa"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Packs an Emotional Punch","reviewBody":"Road trip movies are difficult to pull off because it's so easy for them to be too familiar and generic. While there are some parts in End of Sentence that feel familiar, what sets it apart is how incredible John Hawkes and Logan Lerman are. They are two of the most underrated actors working right now and they both give emotionally impactful performances. Plus, this film is full of beautiful scenery and has a genuinely emotionally resonant story. Overall, a good film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4373,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-26","keywords":"jail visit,mother son relationship,bald woman,released from prison,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1970060825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzEzODRlOTktZmM0Yy00NDQzLWI5MTMtZDFhOTlmN2Y1MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzEzODRlOTktZmM0Yy00NDQzLWI5MTMtZDFhOTlmN2Y1MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370035/","name":"John Hawkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0503567/","name":"Logan Lerman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092961/","name":"Sarah Bolger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3830750/","name":"Elfar Adalsteins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0298640/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012116/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315605/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2982401/","name":"Michael Armbruster"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lola vers la mer
Lola
Lola vers la mer
programme.desc: Lola vers la mer: Directed by Laurent Micheli. With Mya Bollaers, Benoît Magimel, Els Deceukelier, Sami Outalbali. Lola, 18 years old, bleach blonde hair, lives in a foster home with Samir, her only friend. Impulsive and lonely, she is trying to get her diploma as a veterinary assistant. When her mother passes away, her father Phillip makes sure that Lola will miss the ceremony. Two years before that, Philip was throwing her out of the family home: at the time, Lola was still Lionel - Philippe is determined to fulfill Catherine's last wish: to be dispersed to the North Sea, in the dunes of her childhood home. Lola on the other hand is furious against her father, but she will not leave her mother alone in this last journey. So they take off together, both unwilling to share a car but determined to take Catherine home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8356178/","name":"Lola vers la mer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ2YTYyZTctYzM0OS00N2U3LTk3MDAtZmQ2MDFiMmFlODJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE0NTk0MjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lola, 18 years old, bleach blonde hair, lives in a foster home with Samir, her only friend. Impulsive and lonely, she is trying to get her diploma as a veterinary assistant. When her mother passes away, her father Phillip makes sure ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8356178/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vio_k"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"An exploration of teenage angst, grief, transgender acceptance and familial ties","reviewBody":"This is a strong performance by Mya Bollaers (a transgender actress in her debut award-winning role). Lola is a teenager who's getting up on her feet after being shunned by her family for coming out as transgender. She's predictably angry and volatile, but also tender and looking for love and acceptance. The film shows just over 24 hours in Lola's life when she reluctantly tries to reconcile with her father and they drive across Belgium towards their beach house. They'll have to weather a few storms - both literal and emotional - while attempting to restore their closeness and learn to understand each other.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":438,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-11","keywords":"written by director,transgender,transgender girl,transgender protagonist,18 year old","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3989421849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkZTI3MWEtOWY4NS00ZmU2LWJiODYtNjVmMzg1MjIyZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkZTI3MWEtOWY4NS00ZmU2LWJiODYtNjVmMzg1MjIyZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9809276/","name":"Mya Bollaers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536095/","name":"Benoît Magimel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345980/","name":"Els Deceukelier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4714963/","name":"Laurent Micheli"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0295851/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449322/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0310366/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4714963/","name":"Laurent Micheli"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Legendy miejskie 3
programme.desc: Twórcy serialu biorą na warsztat historie, które stały się częścią miejskiego folkloru, chociaż nikt nie wie, czy są prawdziwe. Opowiadają je na swój niepowtarzalny sposób.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Córki Rzeszy
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc:
Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"yet another WWII story of interest","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. I never cease to be amazed at the number of stories connected to WWII that translate so well to cinema. This one comes from director Andy Goddard (known mostly for his TV work) and his co-writers Eddie Izzard and Celyn Jones, and takes place in 1939 England, just prior to Germany invading Poland to start the war. The story was inspired by true events.

Augusta-Victoria College for Girls was located in Bexhill-On-Sea, and served as a finishing school for the daughters of the German elite from 1932 through 1939. We open as the school's English teacher, Mr. Wheatley (Nigel Lindsay), frantically flees when he realizes his undercover mission has been discovered. An artistically filmed sequence on the boardwalk ends with Wheatley missing and his bowler floating off on the horizon. We don't know yet what he uncovered, but Thomas Miller (co-writer Eddie Izzard) is quickly hired as the new teacher by Headmistress Miss Rocholl (Oscar winner Dame Judi Dench).

Teacher Ilse Keller (Carla Juri) puts the girls through their robotic lessons and ensures they listen to Nazi propaganda on the radio. Of course, as in most spy thrillers, no one is as they seem - or at least most aren't. Most of the girls seem indistinguishable from each other, save for dark-haired and bespectacled Gretel (Tijan Marei), who is a true outcast. The girls are referred to as the "Hitler League of German Girls" and are being educated and groomed for the planned new socialist nation.

It doesn't take Miller long to uncover a plan, and almost immediately, he's wrongly accused of murder - sending him on the run. It's no spoiler to reveal that Miller is part of British Intelligence, and in the role, Izzard delivers a more restrained performance than what we are accustomed to (see OCEAN'S TWELVE and OCEAN'S THIRTEEN ... and it's very effective. James D'Arcy as Captain Drey enters about halfway through, as does his partner Corporal Willis (played by co-writer Celyn Jones). This offers us a bit of cat and mouse between Drey and Miller, and they are joined in the fun by Charlie the bus driver, played by the always interesting Jim Broadbent.

The plan to evacuate the girls before the war seems a bit overly complicated, but then my experience planning such war time strategy is admittedly non-existent. Still, the lead characters and the setting make this intriguing enough, and cinematographer Chris Seager certainly has some fun with camera angles. For those hooked on all things related to WWII, it's likely a story you haven't heard much about, if anything. From IFC Films, SIX MINUTES TO MIDNIGHT opens March 26, 2021.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3451,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Goldfische
Złote rybki
Die Goldfische
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietel. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1680,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: End of Sentence
Ostatnia wyprawa
End of Sentence
programme.desc: End of Sentence: Directed by Elfar Adalsteins. With John Hawkes, Logan Lerman, Sarah Bolger, Andrea Irvine. After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sean steps out of prison the last thing on his mind is a foreign road trip with his alienated father. What he needs is a fresh start in California. But when his travel plans collapse he reluctantly accepts his father's proposal in return for a ticket to the West Coast and a promise that they never have to see each other again. Between a disconcerting Irish wake, the surfacing of an old flame, the pick up of a pretty hitchhiker and plenty of unresolved issues, the journey becomes a little more than father and son had bargained for." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6910006/","name":"End of Sentence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVmOTkwMjEtOWQ1Ny00Nzc2LWJmNmEtMWVkYTAxNzc0YWJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg4NzM5NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sea","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6910006/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"amirmustafaa"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Packs an Emotional Punch","reviewBody":"Road trip movies are difficult to pull off because it's so easy for them to be too familiar and generic. While there are some parts in End of Sentence that feel familiar, what sets it apart is how incredible John Hawkes and Logan Lerman are. Plus, this film is full of beautiful scenery and has a genuinely emotionally resonant story. IMDb data; ttnr: 6910006, Title: End of Sentence, --- Description: End of Sentence: Directed by Elfar Adalsteins. With John Hawkes, Logan Lerman, Sarah Bolger, Andrea Irvine. After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sean steps out of prison the last thing on his mind is a foreign road trip with his alienated father. What he needs is a fresh start in California. But when his travel plans collapse he reluctantly accepts his father's proposal in return for a ticket to the West Coast and a promise that they never have to see each other again. Between a disconcerting Irish wake, the surfacing of an old flame, the pick up of a pretty hitchhiker and plenty of unresolved issues, the journey becomes a little more than father and son had bargained for." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6910006/","name":"End of Sentence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVmOTkwMjEtOWQ1Ny00Nzc2LWJmNmEtMWVkYTAxNzc0YWJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg4NzM5NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. While there are some parts in End of Sentence that feel familiar, what sets it apart is how incredible John Hawkes and Logan Lerman are. programme.title: Dirty Dancing
Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: Dirty Dancing: Directed by Emile Ardolino. With Jennifer Grey, Patrick Swayze, Jerry Orbach, Cynthia Rhodes. Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0092890/","name":"Dirty Dancing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDY3ODQ2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ2NTYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0092890/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AgentFalco"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfection","reviewBody":"One word sums up this film "Perfection". That's it really!! I saw this film in 1987 when it was released and was completely blown away and like Baby I fell in love with Johnny and Patrick Swayze. It has such classic lines as "I carried a watermelon" and "Nobody puts Baby in the corner" and too many others to mention. I loved the story, the characters, the setting, the dancing, and well the music was phenomenal not one bad song in the whole soundtrack. It just shows that you don't have to spend a fortune to make a great film. Thank you to the cast and crew for making such a wonderful film which makes me smile like a Cheshire cat whenever I watch it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":216660,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"1987-08-21","keywords":"dance,coming of age,teenager,abortion,resort","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dirty Dancing: 30th Anniversary Edition","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1997649433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDVjMTdiNDEtMjhhZi00OTQzLWI0ZTItNzE1Yzc5MDExOTFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDVjMTdiNDEtMjhhZi00OTQzLWI0ZTItNzE1Yzc5MDExOTFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Dirty Dancing: 30th Anniversary"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000664/","name":"Patrick Swayze"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000426/","name":"Jennifer Grey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001583/","name":"Jerry Orbach"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001915/","name":"Emile Ardolino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126028/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075044/","name":"Eleanor Bergstein"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
Gdybym tylko tu był
Wish I Was Here
programme.desc:
Wish I Was Here: Directed by Zach Braff. With Zach Braff, Pierce Gagnon, Kate Hudson, Joey King. A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2870708/","name":"Wish I Was Here","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1MTM5NTY2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE4OTk4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2870708/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexrwatson-888-169026"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wish I Was Here Review","reviewBody":"Admittedly, this is the first Zach Braff film I have seen. I only saw one trailer for the film, and it immediately intrigued me. I did not hate this film, but I also did not love and found myself in a lukewarm middle ground. For everything I liked, there was something I did not like.

First off, the story. The story as a whole deals with living life and dealing with death which was pulled off fairly well. However, there were several things in the script that I feel like took away from the film and the story Braff was telling. One of the those things were the laughs or lack thereof. 

The script thinks its wittier and funnier than it actually is with most jokes missing that hitting. The movie also thinks it's deeper than it actually is. Maybe that's just Braff's style, but to me it seemed like it was more style over substance.

I did really enjoy the soundtrack for the film and Braff gave a good performance as a 30-something-year-old treading the water in his life.

I will definitely give Braff's future movies another shot and will see Garden State soon, but Wish I was Here was just not as good as I hoped it would be.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37685,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-07-25","keywords":"dream sequence,crowdfunded,sex scene,furry,office worker","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1612557593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU2ODg0OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA3NjkzODEx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU2ODg0OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA3NjkzODEx._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Aidan Bloom, a struggling actor, father, and husband, who at 35 is still trying to find a purpose for his life. He winds up trying to homeschool his two children when his father can no longer afford to pay for private education and the only available public school is on its last legs. Through teaching them about life his way, Aidan gradually discovers some of the parts of himself he couldn't find. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103785/","name":"Zach Braff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1428821/","name":"Joey King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3163952/","name":"Pierce Gagnon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103785/","name":"Zach Braff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001099/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103783/","name":"Adam J. Braff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103785/","name":"Zach Braff"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2870708/","name":"Wish I Was Here","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1MTM5NTY2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE4OTk4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2870708/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexrwatson-888-169026","dateCreated":"2014-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wish I Was Here Review","reviewBody":"Admittedly, this is the first Zach Braff film I have seen. I only saw one trailer for the film, and it immediately intrigued me. I did not hate this film, but I also did not love and found myself in a lukewarm middle ground. For everything I liked, there was something I did not like.

First off, the story. The story as a whole deals with living life and dealing with death which was pulled off fairly well. However, there were several things in the script that I feel like took away from the film and the story Braff was telling. One of the those things were the laughs or lack thereof. 

The script thinks its wittier and funnier than it actually is with most jokes missing that hitting. The movie also thinks it's deeper than it actually is. Maybe that's just Braff's style, but to me it seemed like it was more style over substance.

I did really enjoy the soundtrack for the film and Braff gave a good performance as a 30-something-year-old treading the water in his life.

I will definitely give Braff's future movies another shot and will see Garden State soon, but Wish I was Here was just not as good as I hoped it would be.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37685,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-07-25","keywords":"dream sequence,crowdfunded,sex scene,furry,office worker","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1612557593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU2ODg0OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA3NjkzODEx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU2ODg0OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA3NjkzODEx._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Aidan Bloom, a struggling actor, father, and husband, who at 35 is still trying to find a purpose for his life. programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: What Happens in Vegas: Directed by Tom Vaughan. With Cameron Diaz, Ashton Kutcher, Rob Corddry, Lake Bell. A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1033643/","name":"What Happens in Vegas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQyYjE3YjYtNjJkNi00MWY0LWJhNDctZDRmOTY5ZGJiNDI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1033643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dragoneyed363"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just a fun time","reviewBody":"Alright, before you watch this movie, you know it is not going to be some deep, poetic Best Picture nominee. I was not all that excited about seeing it in the first place myself if I am going to be honest, but I only got it because there was nothing better to get I guess, and in the end, I had a fun time with it. Ashton Kutcher and Cameron Diaz have good chemistry on set, not exactly Gone with the Wind type of romance, but enough to make it feel somewhat believable and make these characters interact well with the plot.\n\nThe movie is quite humorous. Not one of the funniest or even most memorable Rom-Coms I have ever seen, but here again, it does not try to be anything more than it is. The story is cute and entertaining if you give it even the slightest bit of chance to be, and though I would say if you are looking for a Rom-Com for you and your significant other there are plenty of better ones like The Proposal and The Ugly Truth you could see, if you have any interest in seeing this, I encourage you to do it because if you know what you are in for, it will be just what you needed. A refreshing little movie that deserves better reception.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":170898,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-05-07","keywords":"jackpot,father son relationship,casino,neo screwball comedy,male and female protagonists","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Happens in Vegas ... "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1117791/","name":"Rob Corddry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891114/","name":"Tom Vaughan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1401416/","name":"Dana Fox"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

I was not all that excited about seeing it in the first place myself if I am going to be honest, but I only got it because there was nothing better to get I guess, and in the end, I had a fun time with it. Ashton Kutcher and Cameron Diaz have good chemistry on set, not exactly Gone with the Wind type of romance, but enough to make it feel somewhat believable and make these characters interact well with the plot.\n\nThe movie is quite humorous. Not one of the funniest or even most memorable Rom-Coms I have ever seen, but here again, it does not try to be anything more than it is. The story is cute and entertaining if you give it even the slightest bit of chance to be, and though I would say if you are looking for a Rom-Com for you and your significant other there are plenty of better ones like The Proposal and The Ugly Truth you could see, if you have any interest in seeing this, I encourage you to do it because if you know what you are in for, it will be just what you needed. A refreshing little movie that deserves better reception.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":170898,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-05-07","keywords":"jackpot,father son relationship,casino,neo screwball comedy,male and female protagonists","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Happens in Vegas ... programme.desc: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping: Directed by Akiva Schaffer, Jorma Taccone. With Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone, Akiva Schaffer, Sarah Silverman. When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3960412/","name":"Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMzk2ODI4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgzNzQ5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3960412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very entertaining","reviewBody":"For a satire like this to work, it needs to have its heart in the right place. I was hesitant when watching the trailers, but fortunately the film doesn't lose track of the bigger humanization with these characters and it wears its heart on its sleeve. But perhaps that's also why it didn't go as far as it could have gone, and when all is said and done, perhaps plays things a little too safely. Still, it's vastly entertaining and the performances are aces. Andy Samberg excels at the comedy but also on making the lead a very likable protagonist, no mater his flaws. It's very easy to root for him. As a whole, definitely go seek this out and recommend it to your friends. Very underrated film that deserved to be bigger."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58658,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Musical"],"datePublished":"2016-06-03","keywords":"pop star,scene during end credits,repetition in title,concert,mockumentary","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2277946393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg","description":"When his new album fails to sell records, pop/rap superstar conner4real goes into a major tailspin and watches his celebrity high life begin to collapse. Jens and Mike, two police officers on routine patrol, find themselves trapped in a maze of buildings when unrest spreads." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11081050/","name":"Shorta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlOGIzODQtMmQ5OC00NGMwLWJjY2UtOWVhOWIwODAwMmRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA2MDQ3MTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"Jens and Mike, two police officers on routine patrol, find themselves trapped in a maze of buildings when unrest spreads.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11081050/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"freddy_at_home"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie! Watch it on a weekend with beers and pizza","reviewBody":"I am one of those who are pretty tired of fake reviews. No need to make fake reviews about this movie, it's a pretty good movie without the "over the top" reviews made by some random crew or what ever.

It's not Judge Dredd (as some said) and it's not pumping action from start till end (also said) but it's a good solid quality Danish movie. A bit of a gangster feel, but not much really. If this had been an American movie, it would have been just another typical cop movie. But being a Danish movie, it's not like that and it feels a bit deeper.

You can read all about what it's about, so skipping all that. I think it was a good pizza-weekend-movie and it wasn't boring. It had a good story and good acting all over. This is no big CGI movie, and more of a character and story building movie. A big relevant story these days. I believed in it.

I liked it, so did my buds. We agreed on it being entertaining enough and it kept us off the phone. But, one or two almost cracked. Just almost... There really isn't anything new about this movie, that we haven't seen before. But as I wrote over here, being Danish. it gave a different feel about it.

Worth checking out! Me and my friends ended up on a 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4638,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-10-08","keywords":"one word title,police officer,patrol,police partner,new partner","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer [eng sub]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3662201113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzNmOGQyMjUtMDdlOC00ZTg5LWI5MGItMmI2NmM2ZWI3M2FkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzNmOGQyMjUtMDdlOC00ZTg5LWI5MGItMmI2NmM2ZWI3M2FkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The exact details of what took place while Talib Ben Hassi (19) was in police custody remain unclear. Police officers, Jens and Mike, are on routine patrol in Svalegården's ghetto when news of Talib's death comes in over the radio, igniting uncontrollable, pent-up rage in the ghetto's youth, who lust for revenge. Suddenly, the two officers find themselves fair game and must fight tooth and claw to find a way out."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1315040/","name":"Jacob Lohmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3525868/","name":"Simon Sears"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11050612/","name":"Tarek Zayat"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4888759/","name":"Frederik Louis Hviid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3504109/","name":"Anders Ølholm"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0378922/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048411/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3504109/","name":"Anders Ølholm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4888759/","name":"Frederik Louis Hviid"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

Ammonite
programme.desc: Ammonite: Directed by Francis Lee. With Sarah White, Liam Thomas, Sam Parks, Kate Winslet. 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7983894/","name":"Ammonite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM3ZGZlMWUtMjY1OS00NjBkLWE4MjQtODJkMmQ1MzdjYzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7983894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reyesrh"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silence Art","reviewBody":"I just wanna point out that the scenes with no dialogue are the one's that say a lot ... Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Frozen

Frozen
programme.desc: Frozen: Directed by Chris Buck, Jennifer Lee. With Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad. When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2294629/","name":"Frozen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1MjQwMTE5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3MTcyMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2294629/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"diego-echeverria"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Deserves the Oscar","reviewBody":"Frozen is a blast of a movie with hilarious moments, dark meaning and emotional message. You will cry, laugh and feel amazing after watching this Oscar deserving movie. With some of the best spontaneous singing I've seen in Disney, this musical movie is also a pleasure to your mouse ears. This is probably the best animated movie I've seen this year, simply marvelous and excellent. The Disney familiar concepts of love and bravery are demonstrated, as well as kindness, determination, the horrors of your fears and stress and the meaning of "true love". This movie is guaranteed to make you crack as smile with the hilarious little snowman called "Olaf", who is probably my favorite character in the movie. A bit darker than most Disney films, it will also touch and amuse even teenagers. This movie has the same kind of humor as the last movie from these creators, Wreck-it Ralph (which is also one of my Disney favorites, explaining why I love this one). Disney really over did themselves with this one!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":595457,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-11-27","keywords":"magic,snowman,sister sister relationship,ice,snow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""First Time in Forever" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2482677785","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2Nzk4NTg4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzIzMTc0MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2Nzk4NTg4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzIzMTc0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fearless optimist Anna teams up with Kristoff in an epic journey, encountering Everest-like conditions, and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna's sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068338/","name":"Kristen Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579953/","name":"Idina Menzel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2676147/","name":"Jonathan Groff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601644/","name":"Jennifer Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601644/","name":"Jennifer Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0026153/","name":"Hans Christian Andersen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="
